items.summary: Generate a new heart-shaped resin memorial image that includes a cat portrait (replacing or updating the Whiskers memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the cat's portrait within the resin mold.

Generate a new hexagon-shaped resin memorial image that includes a bird portrait (replacing or updating the Tweety memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the bird's portrait within the resin mold.

Update the square resin memorial image (Nabi) so the animal portrait also has a black frame border surrounding it within the resin mold, consistent with the framing applied to the heart and hexagon memorials.

Update the ShapeShowcases component to render the newly generated heart, hexagon, and square memorial images from frontend/public/assets/generated, replacing any previously used image sources for these three memorials.
